column1: Smoque BBQ////The baked beans are my favorite side
column4: cornbread is ok.  I really do  not like the brisket chili at all
column5: it has good flavor but its just not my thing.  Cole slaw is ok.  Fries are good when fresh
column6: but like any fried food they do not transfer well
column7: so no luck with take out.
